title: Friends or Enemies? Anglo-French relations
itunes:title: Friends or Enemies? Anglo-French relations
itunes:subtitle: Historians Fabrice Bensimon and Renaud Morieux explore the complex relationship between France and Britain in the 18th and 19th centuries. It was an era dominated by war and revolution but one which also saw more positive interactions between the...
description:
Historians Fabrice Bensimon and Renaud Morieux explore the complex relationship between France and Britain in the 18th and 19th centuries. It was an era dominated by war and revolution but one which also saw more positive interactions between the countries

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
